properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}‘Twas grace that taught my heart to fear, And grace my fears relieved. How precious did that grace appear, The hour I first believed!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Through many dangers, toils and snares, We have already come. ‘Twas grace that brought us safe thus far, And grace will lead us home.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When we’ve been there ten thousand years, Bright shining as the sun, We’ve no less days to sing God’s praise Than when we first begun.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lord has promised good to me, His word my hope secures. He will my shield and portion be as Long as life endures.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yea, when this flesh and heart shall fail, And mortal life shall cease. I shall possess within the veil, A life of joy and peace.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The earth shall soon dissolve like snow, The sun forbear to shine. But God, Who called me here below, Will be forever mine.{/lang-eng}
